New email from "claude[bot]" <notifications@github.com>
Subject: Re: [BillChirico/bills-bot] feat: hard gate to prevent @here and @everyone mentions (PR #62)

@claude[bot] commented on this pull request.



> + */
+export async function safeFollowUp(interaction, options) {
+  return interaction.followUp(prepareOptions(options));
+}
+
+/**
+ * Safely edit an interaction reply.
+ * Sanitizes content and enforces allowedMentions.
+ *
+ * @param {import('discord.js').CommandInteraction} interaction - The interaction whose reply to edit
+ * @param {string|object} options - Edit content or options object
+ * @returns {Promise<import('discord.js').Message>} The edited message
+ */
+export async function safeEditReply(interaction, options) {
+  return interaction.editReply(prepareOptions(options));
+}

ðŸ”µ **Nitpick â€” Documentation Gap**

Per AGENTS.md documentation requirements (lines 145-161), new utility files should be added to the Key Files table. Both `safeSend.js` and `sanitizeMentions.js` should be documented:

```markdown
| `src/utils/safeSend.js` | Safe message wrappers that sanitize @everyone/@here mentions |
| `src/utils/sanitizeMentions.js` | Mention sanitization utility (defense-in-depth for #61) |
```

This helps future contributors (human or AI) discover these utilities.

--
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
https://github.com/BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/62#pullrequestreview-3806200388
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.

Message ID: <BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/62/review/3806200388@github.com>

INSTRUCTIONS: Evaluate this email. If important (login codes, billing, payments, action required, replies to Bill, package tracking), DM Bill using: message action=send channel=discord target=user:191633014441115648 message="brief summary". If not important (marketing, newsletters, spam, test emails from himself, Google security alerts about new sign-ins/devices), reply NO_REPLY. SKIP all Google Security Alert emails. Auto-track any package tracking numbers with 17TRACK.
<<<END_EXTERNAL_UNTRUSTED_CONTENT>>>

Current time: Sunday, February 15th, 2026 â€” 8:38 PM (America/New_York)
